name: CalmMyDog
0:
”Alexa open calm my dog”
”Alexa launch calm my dog”
”Alexa play calm my dog”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: calm my dog
des:
Your dog is bored? Listening to this music will help your dog feel more relaxed and calm, less anxious, sleep more, and be generally happier. Playing this music is a great way to ensure that your best furry friend feels relaxed. If you feel a bit stressed out yourself, you will enjoy these soothing sounds yourself. It's very relaxing all around :)

Playing calming music – will help to buffer the noise and sight of fireworks. These aren’t just useful for 4th July fireworks, Chrismas Fireworks, New Year Fireworks, Diwali Fireworks, or Bonfire Night either – if your pets are anxious about staying home alone or afraid of loud noises and crowded parties, then try this calming music. Relaxing Music can reduce the sudden impact of firework sounds and help your pets stay calm.

More Info:
Relaxing Sounds: are the best music for pets. Relaxing Sleeping Music for Dogs, Cats, and Other Pets. It helps - Calm Down Your Dog, Pet Relaxation, Stress Relief, Anxiety Medication, Sleep Aids, Music Therapy for Dogs, Happy Animal, New Age Music for Puppy & Kitty, Music for Cats to Calm Down, Relaxing Music for Your Pet, Calm Your Anxious Dog, Nature Sounds for Relaxation. Music for Helps when Grooming, Restlessness. #separationanxiety #musicfordogs
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
